body:
BIG NEWS!

As we always say, our customers within the Art Lovers' Niche community are the best. We have been working hard, behind the scenes, and are happy to report that we are opening-up a new gallery about 2 blocks from our current gallery, to better serve you. The new gallery, "The Annex," will be open in a couple months. The Annex is located within a house that is about 100 years old (kind of a newer house for us, as we are used to our 1889 home!). Like Bedford Fine Art Gallery, The Annex will soon be busting at the seams with fine art, so please keep opening your emails for updates and exciting new art to fall-in-love with!

Please click here to explore the Gallery
Page on the website - don't miss out!
